basic.description: This course covers a variety of qualitative research methods that may be used in library and information science. It explores general, epistemological, and ethical issue with qualitative research; methods of data collection; techniques for data analysis; and evaluation of qualitative research. It includes readings, short- and long-form writing, in-class discussions, and practical exercises in qualitative research.
basic.subject: LIS
basic.title: Qualitative Research in Information Studies
